original_text: The prophets wrote about Elijah. They said he would come again, to prepare for the Messiah. They were writing about John, and you should believe their message.
korean_text: 만일 너희가 즐겨 받을진대 오리라 한 엘리야가 곧 이 사람이니라

sentences.original_text: They said he would come again,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그가 다시 올 것이라고 말했습니다,

sentences.original_text: and you should believe their message.
